snippet: Staffan de Mistura will hold individual meetings with representatives of the warring parties and the countries that support them. It is not known if Iran, perhaps the top supporter of Syria’s government, will be involved.
abstract: United Nations spokesman says Syria's envoy Staffan de Mistura will attempt to revive negotiations between warring parties and countries that aid them; it is unknown whether Iran is involved.

byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Staffan de Mistura will hold individual meetings with representatives of the warring parties and the countries that support them. It is not known if Iran, perhaps the top supporter of Syria’s government, will be involved.

headline.main: U.N.’s Syria Envoy Looks to Revive Talks
headline.print_headline: U.N.’s Syria Envoy Looks to Revive Talks
